creator: steve_donaldson@yahoo.com
text:
Trying to set up php/mysql/apache to run on winxp sp2, downloaded 
files:apache_2.2.4-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi , installed ok, but no LIBPHP5.so in 
directories.  
PHP 5.2.1
MySql 5.0.27
added line "LoadModule php5_module libexec/libphp5.so" results in error unable 
to start apache.
have searched for lib*.so  -not found!
when line removed all works except cant do any mysql stuff!!!
any help would be useful

creator: trawick@apache.org
text:
PHP isn't provided by us (Apache httpd server).  Seek help on a user support
list or from wherever you got PHP for where the library is installed and what
LoadModule directive to use.
